General.Name: Intershop Holding AG
General.Description: Intershop Holding AG, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a real estate company that focuses on the purchase, development, and sale of real estate in Switzerland. The company is involved in the residential and commercial projects. It also engages in the rental of office, education, light industrial, logistics, retail, restaurants, residential, and parking spaces. The company was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Zurich, Switzerland.
